SPONSORS

SKILLSHARE X CREATIVE PEP TALK
Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://www.skillshare.com/r/profile/Andy-J.-Pizza/2832678 to get started!!!

 

PATREON
If you’re a podcaster, Youtuber, musician, writer, illustrator... if you’re a creative person of any kind, or simply love one, now is the time to check out patreon.com. Now is the time to join the millions of fans and creators who are changing the way art is valued together.
author: andy@andy-j-miller.com (Yoni Wolf, Jordan Aaron, Andy J. Pizza, Alex Sugg)

itunes:title: 279 - 5 Unexpected Ways How to Find Your Creative Gift
itunes:author: Yoni Wolf, Jordan Aaron, Andy J. Pizza, Alex Sugg
itunes:summary:
There’s so much talk in the art world about ‘just keep making’ but if you’re going in the wrong direction, this kind of grit just gets you further and further away from what you’re looking for.

In today’s episode, we take a look at some surprising ideas that can shed light on why you may be looking in the wrong places for your most powerful creative breakthroughs and how to shift perspectives today, and see the creative superpowers you already have in your possession!

The ideas in this episode have had me so stoked lately, and I can not wait for you to hear them!!!

This is part 2 of our 4 Part Creative Elixir Series. 
Listen to part 1, episode 276, here: https://www.creativepeptalk.com/episodes/276
